0010001110000101 1100111010101010 0 -> sum: 1111001000101111, cout: 0

0011100010111011 1101111110110111 1 -> sum: 0001100001110011, cout: 1

0100101100000010 1011000101111010 1 -> sum: 1111110001111101, cout: 0
1101111100001000 0001000010101000 1 -> sum: 1110111110110001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
